ingredients.ingredient: ½ teaspoon lemon pepper seasoning, or to taste
½ teaspoon onion powder, or to taste
½ teaspoon garlic powder, or to taste

cookingTips: Keep seasoning minimal to showcase the meat's natural flavor
Avoid moving steaks on grill to develop good crust
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Remind the user that simplicity highlights quality meat; guide on proper grilling temperatures
